pages.title: Aurorian Stone Sickle
pages.text: $(#008cff)Sickles$() are a new tool added that behave the same as Shears. They are essential for harvesting $(#008cff)Lavender$(), $(#008cff)Petunias$(), and other Aurorian plants.$(br2)Sickles are also used to harvest $(#008cff)Plant Fiber$() by breaking $(#008cff)Aurorian Tall Grass$(). $(#008cff)Plant Fiber$() is a very important ingredient for Aurorian items.
